name: The Warrior's Trail
description:
STORY

You are playing as Elin, who is sent on a quest by the viking god Thor to retrieve his stolen hammer. On your way, you will encounter gruesome monsters which are sent by the trickster God Loki to stop you.  Gather new equipment to aid you on your dangerous journey. Are you ready?!?

CONTROLS

PRODUCTION TEAM

Tiryon Williams

Programmer (Inventory, Controller support)

Takaaki Kumazawa

Programmer (Enemy AI, Random Generation)

Sarah Bohm

Designer (Assets, Interface, Level Design)

Andrew Smith

Designer (Level Design)

Subit Shresthra

Designer (Weapon Icons)
